meanings.definition: Very great in size, amount, or degree.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was immensely large compared to the mouse.
meanings.sent2: The cake was immensely delicious and sweet.
meanings.sent3: The mountain looked immensely small from the airplane.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was immensely bright, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The library had an immensely vast collection of books.
